items.title: Score an unlocked Google Pixel 8 Pro at $400 off w/ a FREE $300 Pixel Watch and a case ($735 in savings)
items.summary:
Update: This deal is live again as part of the Google Birthday sale through September 28. Details below in the original post in our Google Birthday sale coverage.

As you likely already know, the new series 10 Google Pixel phones are inbound next month, and that likely means Google will soon be done with the Google Pixel 8 and no longer carry it officially. And for folks who aren’t interested in paying the premium for the latest and greatest handsets, you might want to take a look at the particularly notable clearance offer Google is offering – you can land the Pixel 8 Pro at $400 off with a FREE $300 Pixel Watch 2 and a FREE $35 Google Pixel Pro 8 case too. Details below.

items.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 ticket rates increase after just 4 days
items.summary: Your window to save up to $668 on TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 closes in just 4 days. Regular Bird pricing ends September 26 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Join 10,000+ founders, investors, and innovators shaping the future of tech at the conference where startup legends like Discord and Mint got their start.

items.summary: Three devs who worked on NotebookLM are now building an app called Huxe, which can help users dive deep into topics by generating a "podcast" with multiple AI hosts.

items.summary:
Tuesday morning’s lineup of the best deals popping on the App Store are now ready to roll with highlights like Streets of Rage 4, Northgard, Moncage, BE-A Walker, and more. On the hardware side of things we have early deals on all of the new TechWoven cases for iPhone 17 Pro/Max as well as the official Apple Silicone and Clear cases for all of the new iPhone models. Those offers join discounts on Apple Watch Ultra 3, Apple’s most affordable full-size 2025 model M3 iPad Air sitting down at the Amazon low, the M4 Mac mini back down to $499, and an ongoing all-time low on the all-black Apple Watch Ocean Band. Head below for a closer look at the apps.

items.summary: Alaa Abdel Fattah, who was imprisoned in Egypt for six years, is reunited with his family in Cairo after being pardoned.

items.title: Meta launches the American Technology Excellence Project, a super PAC to fight AI policy bills at the state level; it previously launched a California PAC (Ashley Gold/Axios)
items.summary:
Ashley Gold / Axios:
Meta launches the American Technology Excellence Project, a super PAC to fight AI policy bills at the state level; it previously launched a California PAC  —  Meta launched a new super PAC on Tuesday to help fight off what it sees as onerous AI and tech policy bills across the country, per an announcement shared exclusively with Axios.

items.title: Trump administration proposes new H-1B visa process favoring higher-skilled, better-paid workers
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -The Trump administration on Tuesday released a proposal that would rework the H-1B visa selection process to favor higher-skilled and better-paid workers, according to a related Federal Register notice, a move that follows a White House proclamation on Friday introducing a $100,000 fee for the visas. Read full story

items.title: Bring Madden NFL 26 anywhere on Nintendo Switch 2, now down at Amazon all-time low (30% off)
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering Madden NFL 26 on Nintendo Switch 2 on sale for $49.99 shipped so you can take gridiron action anywhere. This is a regularly $70 release you can land at nearly 30% off – today’s price is the lowest we have tracked on Amazon since its release this past spring on Switch 2. While Nintendo’s latest console might not be the first place you think to play the latest Madden, it is a great way to bring the game mobile and if it’s the only console you have access to, this is a solid price if you’re looking to land a copy now. 

Nintendo Switch 2 now up for purchase at Amazon with no invitation needed…have any store credit to use?

  • Nintendo Switch 2 at Amazon $449
  • Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart Bundle at Amazon

items.title: Prep for snow with Greenworks’ 80V 12-inch cordless shovel kit at the best price in six months for $233 (Reg. up to $350)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Greenworks 80V 12-inch Cordless Snow Shovel with 2.0Ah battery at $232.74 shipped, which beats out the brand’s direct website pricing, where it is sitting at its full $350 MSRP. At Amazon, though, we’ve been seeing it hold out at $308 since March, and falling to $280 since late July, with the total 33% markdown off the MSRP that’s being offered here giving us the best pricing of the last 6 1/2 months, saving you $117 over buying it directly from Greenworks, and landing $33 above the annual low we last saw in January.

items.title: Razer’s originally $150 Viper V2 Pro HyperSpeed wireless gaming mouse is 58% off today at $63 low
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Razer’s Viper V2 Pro HyperSpeed gaming mouse in black down to $62.99 shipped. This gaming mouse originally retailed at $150 but has lately been fetching closer to $100, with occasional spikes up to $140 in recent weeks. It dipped to the $80 mark last month as part of a Prime-exclusive offer, but today’s deal beats that price with an additional $17 discount. This marks the lowest price we’ve tracked for this wireless gaming mouse since its launch, making it a great time to grab one – whether you’ve had your eye on it or are just looking to upgrade your battlestation.

items.title: This iBUYPOWER RTX 5060-powered gaming PC delivers serious value at $351 off today
items.summary:
Walmart is running a big GeForce sale with steep discounts on RTX 50-series gaming rigs at the moment, and one of the standout offers is this iBUYPOWER Element SE desktop for $849 shipped. Regularly $1,200, this deal knocks $351 off the usual price, making it the lowest we can find right now. It delivers some serious value with an RTX 5060 GPU for folks on a budget, and it even comes bundled with a keyboard and mouse so you’re ready to play out of the box. It’s among the best gaming PC deals from the GeForce Week sale, and a similarly-specced PC with a Ryzen 7 8700F config is going for $1,120 at Best Buy.

Home Minister Saifuddin Nasution Ismail announced that MyKad replacements for damaged chips will be free until 7 October. After all, that’s one of two things needed to benefit from the RON95 petrol subsidies, dubbed BUDI95. Due to this, the ministry also expects there to be an influx of people looking to do just that. Which […]

items.title: BMW Unveils Next-Generation iX5 Hydrogen
items.summary:
BMW has unveiled the next-generation X5 SUV, which will be available with five different powertrains. Customers can choose from petrol, diesel, plug-in hybrid, and fully electric options. However, the most notable addition is a hydrogen fuel cell variant, known as iX5, marking a first for BMW. The powertrain has been in development since 2023, undergoing […]

items.summary:

Alongside the debut of the new Apple Watch Ultra 3, Apple debuted some new colors for its Ocean Band, but the still compatible all-black model has just dropped to a new Amazon all-time low at $79.99 shipped. More details below.
